website_summaries.verdict: Sturdiness and painless installation aside, we appreciate the multiple size options, so no matter how many hooks you need per room, they perfectly match all throughout your home.
pros: Features 6 steel hooks with a chrome finish
Effortlessly hangs over most door sizes
cons: The over door hook rack featuring 6 hooks is relatively expensive when compared to competing models

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This hangar works quite well. For those of you who know how to use a ruler, the inside dimension of the part that fits over the door is 1.75" and the sheet metal that forms that hook is a little less than 1/16" thick. Each hook has a hole on top to screw down onto the top of your door.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Big

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable product
customer_reviews.text: I love these racks! I have them on pretty much every door in my home, and I use them for everything. They sit right on the door so there is no installation and they can hold an amazing amount of items. I have never had to replace one (despite near-constant use) and my oldest one is around 6 years old, so I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jain Wilks

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of towel bar space in our bathroom and this works very well to hold hubby's towel and get it nice and dry for next usa
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for the width (one of the widest on amazon that fits over a door) and the large hook size. Not a lot of towel bar space in our bathroom and this works very well to hold hubby's towel and get it nice and dry for next usage. He mostly throws the towel over all/most of the hooks to spread it out more and this works great with our thick bath towels.
customer_reviews.author: mjb

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product! Fits perfectly without rattling in my doorframe. I got the three hook one and it’s exactly what I wanted! Plus it is super low profile if you don’t have lots of space in between your door & the wall. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Hall

customer_reviews.title: Definitely something to hang your hat on
customer_reviews.text: This hook rack is perfect for what I need. I like how the ends of the racks are a little rounded and not just pointy, because it doesn't leave those stretched out marks on my shirts/pants when I hang them up. Also, it's awesome that each rack has a top rack and a bottom rack. I use the bottom racks for my pants and shirts and other things I need to hang, and I use the top racks for my hats. This thing has helped me organize my closet immensely, and I'd recommend it to anyone looking to free up some closet space!
customer_reviews.author: Yong L.

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 to stack them on each other for a hat collection. In my opinion the hangers are to close together and I'm just using for hats. But if you could get that many coats or jackets on there I believe the construction is solid to hold alot of weight. For the price I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: M. Foye

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy hooks.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy hooks. They hang right over the door and do not interfere with the operation of my door. I use mine in the bathroom to hang my bathrobe on. There’s been no sign of corrosion so the finish is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Clay R Burton

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, classy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, classy, stylish and functional; I LOVE this thing! I can fit 12+ coats/bags on it thanks to the double tiered hooks. It fits over the front door to our apartment perfectly with no rattling when we open or close the door. It's a great addition to our entryway! Overall it exceeded my expectations and I would definitely recommend this product :)
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hooks
customer_reviews.text: These hooks fit on my doors and don’t really slide around. I put one in the bathroom and one in my closet. I like the large hooks because the bath towels do not slide off. It also has no problem holding 6 bags. I’m glad this came in a set! I would definitely buy again if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Mango

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Already have a couple of these for hanging scarves, hats etc. Bought two more for towel hangers in my bathroom, since there is no convenient place to put a towel bar (sounds silly, but true!). So, this was the perfect alternative; one over each closet door.
customer_reviews.author: John/Nadya

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I used this in our master bathroom to hang our towels on and also to hang extras like my hairdryer,curling iron, ect. Super easy to put up, screws were provided (but I used ones I already had) Enough space between each hook for large,bulky towels Has held up fine to weight of several damp towels at one time too. Nice quailty for the low price. Overall, I am very happy with mine and would have to recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey & Jerome

customer_reviews.title: ... people using one bathroom right now so this is great for everyone to be able to hang their towels ...
customer_reviews.text: We have five people using one bathroom right now so this is great for everyone to be able to hang their towels and have them conveniently located for their showers. My only problem is that the hanger and towels are heavy and are causing problems closing the door! I am trying to adjust the rack so that the weight is more evenly distributed. This is great, though, because the towels are not all over the bathroom and get a chance to dry!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: It fits, looks good and helps me organize!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, value and function, it you can't beat it! I searched at a big box store but couldn't find something I liked, so thanks to the quickness and expediency that is Amazon I found what I needed via other reviews and a good price point, so I wanted to return the favor to others who searched as I had. I would have liked the same in white, but found the silver to be very attractive so I'm happy. I purchased for the bathroom, but would work for the bedroom as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Serra

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this over the bathroom door in my camper, and the door is thin. So I do have to put something between the door and the hooks. I've used folded up pieces of shelf paper. But this is a handy dandy addition to a very small camper, towels, jackets, everything hangs nicely and keeps things picked up and put away. I really like the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Margma

customer_reviews.title: Nice over-the-door hanger for extra items
customer_reviews.text: Good over-the-door hanger. Adds that extra hanging space you need in the bathroom and other areas for coats, robes, and other items. Nice and sturdy. I like that it has a lot of hooks for all those extras I might have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't let my door close
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this, but was disappointed that with it, my door won't close. I set up for a return, and was pleasantly surprised that it was immediately processed and refunded, and I don't have to return the product. While the product is a dud, I have to give 5 stars for customer service and satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: angelarosie

customer_reviews.title: Works Great In Our Camper
customer_reviews.text: Works great for holding towels in the small bathroom of our camper trailer. Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: michael price

customer_reviews.title: This item fits well and flat on our door so ...
customer_reviews.text: This item fits well and flat on our door so the door can close with the hook on it. This is our 3rd one of these. I keep buying to put on doors around our home and in the dorm because the hooks are round and smooth, does not leave an imprint on clothing as items dry.
customer_reviews.author: Meewa

customer_reviews.title: Fits well but doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: This fits our bathroom door quite well. It's quite long - at 5'4" I have no trouble reaching to hang or remove items from the hooks. My only complaint is that it tends to swing forward and move sideways when there is only 1 item on the rack and that item is removed. Most of the time, there are several (heavy) towels so this is not a huge problem. Overall, I like the functionality and the chrome finish - much better than other over-the-door racks.
customer_reviews.author: MrsLimenez

customer_reviews.title: I love over the door hooks so I ordered this one
customer_reviews.text: I love over the door hooks so I ordered this one. Product fits over the door great and works as expected, but it arrived bent significantly out of shape (enough that it didn't fit over the door right away). I was able to bend it back with some effort, but it does not lie completely flat. Perhaps it got damaged in transit, it was not packaged with any padding or bubble wrap. Love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these. Work perfectly on 1.75" thick door and 1.25" door. Won't fit more that 1.75" door. Thinking about ordering a couple more because they will fit any of my doors and don't scratch the upper door frame.
customer_reviews.author: moveon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but hard I can't get the door to close.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a dorm, so hooks like these are a lifesaver. These hooks are sturdy, I have no problem hanging anything on them, no matter how heavy. However, I wish that the part that goes over the door was shorter, because my wardrobe door no longer closes all the way. That is the only drawback, but it is inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: silverOakleaf51

customer_reviews.title: Arms to short to box with my door
customer_reviews.text: Over the door handles are way too short for my doors. I don't understand why they make this product with such short arms. Returned it. Amazon took care of me.
customer_reviews.author: Pogostyx

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have very few spaces to hang things in my apartment and we aren't allowed to install hanging racks. I had been looking all over for one I could hang on my bedroom door and still be able to close the door. This works perfectly and has lots of hooks. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Blue DragonflyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Wide hooks are good for holding jackets (they tend to fall off of ...
customer_reviews.text: Wide hooks are good for holding jackets (they tend to fall off of the thin/knobby hangers.) Helps avoid the "throw every jacket on the floor/bed" syndrome. Looks nice, doesn't thump on the door. I like it, it does all what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Do you have a door? Do you have outerwear?
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing way to save space in an otherwise cramped apartment. You can put it over your entryway door and hang your coats, hoodies, scarves, whatever you want on it. You can put it over a closet door to save space for frequently used outerwear. Honestly, as long as you have a door, this is probably a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised on how much this can hold without falling out or the hooks bending.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Fleurinor

customer_reviews.title: Great Coat Hooks
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. It's pretty self-explanitory.. The thing comes assembled and ready to hang. I've got my three heaviest coats on each third small hook to test weight and it's holding just fine. (Most of my coats are "gothic" in style.. Super heavy denim or denim-like material and lots of metal decorations.)
customer_reviews.author: GL!+cH

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: I LOOOVE THIS!!! I always had issue placing clothes somewhere, my towel and backpack etc! this is sooo AMAZING to just have behind my door. And it's very strong! ADVISE: depending on the quality of your door (if is a really fancy wood) cover with duck tape to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Semorile

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these over-the-door holders that I've purchased (one through Amazon, one through a big box store), and I'm so glad to have made this purchase again. It helps me to make use of space without damaging walls. It's sturdy, and it's held up to five years of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this for a dorm door
customer_reviews.text: This item does not fit on the dorm door well enough for the door to close with ease. What a waste of money. I purchased well in advance of move in day in order to be prepared but now that I want to return it, the return deadline is over.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. I am use it over the door to hold coats and hats. Amazing quality
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Had these hooks on my door for 3 years with no issues! Buying more now for other doors!
customer_reviews.author: TheRussianSpy

customer_reviews.title: Fits over the door and can't tell it's there if ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits over the door and can't tell it's there if the door is open. Holds all of my stuff well
customer_reviews.author: Noreen

customer_reviews.title: Maintains its shape
customer_reviews.text: These have held up really well. A lot of times comparable over the door hooks get warped from opening/closing the door. Not these! They have maintained their shape really well, and you can tell that they're quality items.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these so we can hang things on the inside of bedroom doors of our closet challenged little bungalow. They are very sturdy and easy to install. Great for hanging pj's, robes, hoodies, jackets, etc.
customer_reviews.author: SnowAngel

customer_reviews.title: great rack!
customer_reviews.text: This door rack fit perfectly over my frame (the last one i ordered was too large and wobbled back and forth, made noises when the door shut, etc.) it's roughly an inch width so if your door is larger consider purchasing a bigger rack! also like the modern design and number of hooks (my last one had half as many!)
customer_reviews.author: MastaC

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can't close the bedroom room door while hanging this there.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for added jacket hanging space.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to put over the back door into the garage. Perfect for our outdoor jackets. Thank- you.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Stecker

customer_reviews.title: Metal frame too thick. Won't let me close my doors.
customer_reviews.text: It's a sturdy product, but the main reason is so that I can hang clothes on my door. However, the metal hinges that rest on top of the door are too thick! I can't close my bedroom door. Sometimes it will close, but only if no clothes are on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mona S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great in a Pop-up Trailer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for out camping trailer, which is a Fleetwood pop-up. It lacks space for hanging clothes and jackets. So I gave this a try and it fits over the metal ceiling edge perfectly. We might just have to order another one!
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe Gal

customer_reviews.title: Something for the hubby's mess!
customer_reviews.text: Had to get another one (I already had bought 3 for the kids' rooms). The hubby keeps throwing his "clean" clothes all over the floor or over the baby gate (which is not for hanging clothes on!) so I needed to keep him organized. Guess who hangs his clothes on the new rack hook, I still do! Sigh... at least it's keeping his clothes from being everywhere they shouldn't be!
customer_reviews.author: Migraine Momma =)

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for sneakers and gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the first one so much, I ordered a second one. I actually got one because of something I saw on Fb about using a coat rack to hold sneakers and shoes off the ground, when installed closer to ground level. The first one worked great (much better than the internet picture I found), so I bought another one to install above the first one, to use for winter gloves and mittens.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing changed my life
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this coat rack is incredible. First of all, I have not had a single coat fall off the rack. And you think you could only get one coat per hook, right?? Well you're wrong. I've got two coats on a single hook, and if I have a couple beers and get rowdy sometime I might even out a third. Who knows, this thing could hold a small child it's so sturdy. And dam that chrome is shiny. 10/10 would hang coat up on it again
customer_reviews.author: Dana Flod

customer_reviews.title: Don't work well, make noise when you open he door
customer_reviews.text: Need something between the door and the product metal for don't scratch the door, and don't make noises
customer_reviews.author: Natali Wong

customer_reviews.title: but does the trick and looks very nice! Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, but does the trick and looks very nice! Unfortunately, it didn't come with any screws to lock the rack in place, but it doesn't pose much of an issue. For $10 this is a great item. Wish it had 2-3 more hooks, but I'm still happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa A.

customer_reviews.title: As pictured!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to hang my husband's souvenir baseball hats. So instead of a big stack, now they are hung on the wall in a nice display. I considered a more expensive rack ...... Glad I didn't! This is fine. Strong, works!
customer_reviews.author: shepherdmom

customer_reviews.title: Lots of hooks, fits easily over the door, would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Lots of hooks, fits easily over the door, would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfectly over my bathroom door and doesn't affect ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly over my bathroom door and doesn't affect the shutting of it. I am able to hang towels, a robe, or clothes on it without problems. It serves the exact purpose for which I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Boo Radley 007

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have a narrow door
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit over my closet door. I had to give it to a coworker who just got a new apt. Don't buy this if you have thick closet doors, as I apparently do. The brackets will not fit over the door. Other than that it seems to be made pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Marggie-ot

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang my scarfs and belts on instead of in the closet. I've had it for a couple weeks now and I'm very happy with it. No trouble closing the door and it's stacked high with scarfs and jackets and seems very strong. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Korinne

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This is your run of the mill door hanger. It does exactly what I need it to do....hold towels in my guest bath.
customer_reviews.author: Pearls

customer_reviews.title: They hold items well. Draw back is the door ...
customer_reviews.text: They hold items well. Draw back is the door is getting nicked when closing. Located at the top of door jam.
customer_reviews.author: gail

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction and nice looking. Use to hang resistance bands in home gym so we use the top and bottom hooks. The door still closes with this on it. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cannibal Bob

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for a great price. Looks stylish
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for a great price. Looks stylish, and each hook is kind of a "double" hook as it holds a coat at the bottom and other things like purses or scarves at the top. This has really helped clean up the entrance way to my home.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Mine was bent...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it happened during shipping or what but it was wonky. Hubby tried to straighten it as best he could so that it's at least usable now.
customer_reviews.author: J. BRADEN

customer_reviews.title: Can work on nearly every door
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time. It's thin, but study enough to hold a good collection of towels. Our door clearance is very thin and we had some issues finding a product that fit. Thankfully this one did.
customer_reviews.author: Sly Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: I did not fasten it to the door, but my door has enough space that it doesn't matter (no damage and no slip). I definitely have more than 12 coats/sweaters hanging on it with no problems. Great product for a great price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rose

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This rack is great! Fits perfectly on my closet door. I've hung about 10 purses, belts and scarves on it and there's been no give. I recommend this item, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: John&KristyTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Plenty of hooks for all my clothes
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Plenty of hooks for all my clothes, looks great. The price is great and no installation required just place over the door.
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: It fits nicely over the door and doesn't impede the door closing
customer_reviews.text: Extremely functional coat rack. It fits nicely over the door and doesn't impede the door closing. Having 12 total hooks is a big help and provides plenty of space for coats, scarfs, umbrellas, and so on.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Thorkildsen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love organizing, and I'm wondering why I didn't buy this sooner. It keeps our coats and dog leashes organized but handy, and is seriously sturdy. I'm going to buy another one for our boys' room. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Maclauchlan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great item to hang my hats and other things I want in a place so I can find them.
customer_reviews.author: wayne giesie

customer_reviews.title: ... after our little 2bed 1 bath apartment was holding like 6 people lol
customer_reviews.text: This became a staple after our little 2bed 1 bath apartment was holding like 6 people lol, gave us alot of room to put extra things that we could couldn't in the linen closet lol.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Clapper-Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and works as advertised. Looks nice and is very well-made. I hang it on a bottom rail of my stairs going to the garage and we hang our hats and coats all over it. Very secure and no assembly required!
customer_reviews.author: Kenstrodamus

customer_reviews.title: Great price and exactly what I was looking for in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price and exactly what I was looking for in both the quality and looks department. I am using these in the bathrooms for hanging towels and it works amazingly well.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting my scarves hung up!
customer_reviews.text: This has made organizing my scarves very easy. I even hang some necklaces on it (sturdy ones). It's nice to see the colors displayed. Went right over the door, no problem. I would give it a 5 if it was a little more decorative.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Horse

customer_reviews.title: Returning customer. Bought three of these and wife loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Returning customer. Bought three of these and wife loves them.
customer_reviews.author: neb2n

customer_reviews.title: Extra wide hooks!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this model specifically for fitting over my extra thick door to the garage. It fits beautifully! If anybody else is trying to work around this same problem this rack works great!
customer_reviews.author: PrimeAllTheTime

customer_reviews.title: Works great for hanging coats shirts towels etc
customer_reviews.text: Works great for hanging coats shirts towels etc. But be warned. Do not use this to hold your infant child. Was way to much weight for it and now I have to replace my door. All and all its a pretty solid design though.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Design & Construction
customer_reviews.text: Great design, good quality, and priced right. I added some stick-on pads so the door will not be marred where the rack touches the door surfaces. This rack suits my purposes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Green

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Great for the dog collars and leashes, as well as a jacket, hat, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Rainman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Was tired of my purses being stuffed in a corner on the floor. I saw this and thought it would be perfect. This is fantastic option for hanging my purses so I can see them and they are out of the way. I have already bought another one for my guest bathroom. I bought the 6 hook in chrome. Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 and am very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Simple product that is well made. Bought 2 and am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ridiculiculous

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: So durable -- I've had it for years. Hasn't fit every door I've put it on but I blame the doors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very annoyed with the product already
customer_reviews.text: Designed to fit LARGE THICK doors. Does not fit standard room doors. Very CLANKY. Very annoyed with the product already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for its intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hang purses over my door. The door closes fine and it can hold a number of purses, including large ones well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D

customer_reviews.title: Works great and can hold a lot of items
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold sweatshirts as they were taking up too much room in my actual closet. Works great and can hold a lot of items. Easily two sweatshirts per hook.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits over all the doors in my house whereas another product I bought did not. I am very pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaRN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So convenient to hang clothes rather than throwing them between chair and bed.
customer_reviews.author: Arjun

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: They don't stay put on the door (they can slide from left to right), but otherwise they look and function fine.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Clean looking and sturdy set of hooks
customer_reviews.text: Clean looking and sturdy set of hooks. I have this hanging over my hallway closet for extra storage for guests. It does not impede the closing of the door and created no marks. Highly recommend, I will probably purchase another for my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney T

customer_reviews.title: I don't think it came with anchors for doors that ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it came with anchors for doors that are smaller than the hooks, so now after a few months use it has damaged our door frame.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, not the sturdiest thing in the world though.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Rauen

customer_reviews.title: Should be functional...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived bent but barely functional. The hangers are also too large for the door so I need to get some adhesive bumpers to prop it up. My fault for not measuring it but the package looked as though it had been reached into.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Waterman

customer_reviews.title: Love the double hooks
customer_reviews.text: Love the double hooks on it. Fits perfectly on the back of the door.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described and does what it's supposed to do, not much else to say! Nice to have six hooks for convenience
customer_reviews.author: onefastricerocket

customer_reviews.title: Kinda flimsy looking, but it's cheap and does the ...
customer_reviews.text: Kinda flimsy looking, but it's cheap and does the job I want it to do! All the metal has stayed in place, so it works for me!
customer_reviews.author: erinillicus

customer_reviews.title: This is chipping away at the paint on our door ...
customer_reviews.text: This is chipping away at the paint on our door frame and it's making it hard to open the door.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is a better than expected product. I hadn't expected the quality to be as good as it turned out to be. Have been using it for over 8 months and haven't noticed any kind of wear. No rusting issue. Fits well and and doesnt scar the surface it is used in. I've bought a second one now for the other room
customer_reviews.author: Dipanshu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and hang clothes onto
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and hang clothes onto. Doesn't leave any marks on your door and was a cheap and effective way to organize your clothes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bent immediately
customer_reviews.text: After placing it on the door frame in my daughter's room, it bent immediately and became unusable
customer_reviews.author: Kristi K.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the hanger
customer_reviews.text: I really like the hanger. My only complaint would be that it moves a bit sometimes while taking clothes off of it. Other than that, very useful and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Pranav B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use as a hat rack. Works great and fits inside the small closet door perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good short term storage
customer_reviews.text: I am short! I can reach it to hang my jackets! It does not jump up or turn to one side to keep the door from closing. And it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Grannie B

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I don't need to over extend my arms to hang up. Use this one for the bathroom. I ordered a large one for my coat closet. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderbread
customer_reviews.text: It hangs. It hangs clothes. (Quality and finish is nice)
customer_reviews.author: uber_neko_zero

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality and can hold my bathrobe and wet shower towel with no problems and does not rattle on the door.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Love these hooks
customer_reviews.text: Love these hooks. I'm using them as a coat rack in my living room and in my sons room. Definitely sturdy enough to hold jackets and bookbags.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Rivera

customer_reviews.title: works just fine for what i need it to my daughter has ...
customer_reviews.text: works just fine for what i need it to my daughter has lots of coats and this has held up for the 3 months we've had it.
customer_reviews.author: ll

product_meta.title: iDesign Classico Steel Over-The-Door 12-Hook Storage Rack - 18.75" x 5" x 10.75", Chrome
product_meta.description: Color:6 HookAdd a touch of style and organization to your home with the iDesign Classico Over-The-Door Storage Rack. This hanging organizer is designed with six double hooks (twelve hanging points total) to create instant storage in unused space behind doors for items such as jackets, backpacks, purses, scarves, ties, belts, robes, towels, and more. This versatile metal organizer can be used in the closet, bathroom, bedroom, or any room around the home that you need additional organization. Simply hang it over the top of standard interior residential doors up to 1.5" thick for easy installation and set up - no drilling or hardware required! The durable steel construction with polished chrome finish matches a variety of home decor styles and stands up to every day use. Measuring 18.75" x 5" x 10.75", this organizer rack is ideal for use in compact spaces. With iDesign by InterDesign, you can #LiveSimply every day.
feature_bullets: OVER-THE-DOOR HANGING ORGANIZER: Designed with six double hooks (twelve hanging points total) to create instant storage in unused space behind doors
VERSATILE STORAGE SOLUTION: Can be used in the closet, bathroom, bedroom, or any room around the home that you need additional organization
QUICK OVER-THE-DOOR INSTALLATION: Simply hang over the top of standard interior residential doors up to 1.5" thick for easy installation and set up - no hardware or drilling required!
MADE WITH DURABLE STEEL: Sturdy steel construction with polished chrome finish is made to last and stands up to every day use
COMPACT SIZE: Measures 18.75" x 5" x 10.75" and is ideal for use in compact spaces
